pageContext.claim: “I would love to send Ambassador Sondland, a really good man and great American, to testify, but unfortunately he would be testifying before a totally compromised kangaroo court, where Republican’s rights have been taken away, and true facts are not allowed out for the public.”
pageContext.analysis: Gordon D. Sondland, the U.S. ambassador to the European Union, was not appearing in court but was called for a deposition regarding his actions on Ukraine. Trump has not explained why the ambassador -- a major Trump donor -- would have hurt his case if he testified truthfully.
